Plot: Drugs, Love, the Interpol and a Cartel form a deadly mix in this action-packed thriller. As an Interpol agent tracks down the leaders of a drug Cartel, things quickly turn for the worse with an unexpected twist in the end.
Title: Checkmate, Keep Your Enemies Closer
Actors: William Sadler, Yvonne Maria Schäfer, Manny Perez, Peter Greene
